welcome: Welcome {firstName}! In order to use our service choose from the following options
ourstuff: Here you will find our stickers and our channel
sponsor: To start, choose an option to sponsor your channel/website or else
time: How long do you want to be sponsored for?
name: What is your channel/website name?
pic:
Send me the image to sponsor.The image file should be in PNG or WEBP format with a transparent layer and must fit into a 512x512 square (one of the sides must be 512px and the other 512px or less).

The sticker should use white stroke and shadow, exactly like in this .PSD example: StickerExample.psd. I recommend using Telegram for Web/Desktop when uploading stickers.
description:
Choose a description for your sponsor.

To choose where you want the link to appear, write {link} at the point in the text where you want it to appear. For example: 

Our company, {link}, is a leader in the technology sector.

If the {link} tag is not placed in the text, the link will be placed at the very end.
confirmation_msg: This is a preview of the message to sponsor. Does this look good?
stats_sticker: Our sticker pack has over 5.4M downloads
stats_animated: Our animated sticker pack has over 102k downloads
final_message:
Done, your request has successfully been sent and waiting for approval

To see the status of your request type
/start
animated_instructions:
Send me the animated sticker. The image file should be in .TGS format, created using the Bodymovin-TG plugin for Adobe After Effects.

I recommend using Telegram Desktop when uploading stickers.
channel_pic: Send a file that is going to be included in the message you want to use for your promotion. Only .png, .jpeg, .jpg, .webp, .gif, .mp4 are allowed! If you donâ€™t want to put a file, hit the No fileâŒ button.
